programme.title: Shop on TV
programme.desc: Indulge in a world of incredible deals and must-have products.

programme.title: Steve Backshalls Royal Arctic Challenge
programme.desc: Environmentalist Steve Backshall retraces Prince Charles Arctic adventure in 1975.

programme.title: For the Love of Dogs with Alison Hammond at Christmas
programme.desc: Alison Hammond returns to Battersea Dogs and Cats Home for a festive special hoping to give its canine residents the best Christmas present possible.

programme.title: Night Vision
programme.desc: Night Vision

programme.title: Good Morning Britain
programme.desc: News, current affairs and lively debate.

programme.title: Lorraine
programme.desc: Behind the scenes of one of the biggest nights of the Royal calendar - Princess Kates annual carol service. Also, Dr Amir and Mama Khan share their Christmas cooking tips.

programme.title: This Morning
programme.desc: Ben and Cat are joined by the cast of All Creatures Great and Small, theres music from Michael Ball plus they catch up with Santa ahead of his big night!

programme.title: Loose Women
programme.desc: Kaye Adams, Oti Mabuse, Judi Love and Nadia Sawalha get ready for the big day tomorrow with guest Jason Donovon joining in the Christmas Eve fun in the studio.

programme.title: ITV Lunchtime News
programme.desc: News bulletins from ITV News.

programme.title: E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial
programme.desc: Heart-warming sci-fi adventure film. A troubled young boy tries to help a gentle alien.

programme.title: Santa Claus: The Movie
programme.desc: Classic Christmas film. One of Santas elves leaves to set up his own toy-making business.

programme.title: ITV Evening News
programme.desc: National and international news with reports and analysis from ITVs Correspondents.

programme.title: The Chase Celebrity Christmas Special
programme.desc: Bradley Walsh presents as comedian Lucy Porter, radio and TV presenter Colin Murray, Strictly vocalist Tommy Blaize and actor Asim Chaudhry face five Chasers.

programme.title: Emmerdale
programme.desc: Drama on the Yorkshire Dales with one of Britains longest-running and most beloved soaps.

programme.title: Royal Carols: Together at Christmas
programme.desc: HRH The Princess of Wales hosts a special Christmas carol service at Westminster Abbey with festive musical performances, touching readings, and inspiringly warm films.

programme.title: Coronation Street
programme.desc: Becky invites Lisa to revive their marriage, and Maggie uncovers Eva and Adams secret.

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: The ups and downs of love for different couples, from the prime minister to a porn actor.

programme.title: Christmas Carols on ITV 2025
programme.desc: Myleene Klass hosts a traditional Christmas Eve celebration from St Elisabeths Church in Greater Manchester featuring performances by Catherine Tyldesley, Shayne Ward and more.

programme.title: Steve Backshalls Royal Arctic Challenge
programme.desc: Environmentalist Steve Backshall retraces Prince Charles Arctic adventure in 1975.

programme.title: Gallagher PREM Unleashed
programme.desc: Action from the seventh round of fixtures of the 2025-26 Gallagher PREM Rugby season featuring Leicester v Gloucester, Saracens v Exeter, Harlequins v Bristol and Newcastle v Bath.

programme.title: Night Vision
programme.desc: Night Vision

programme.title: Its a Wonderful Life
programme.desc: Classic fantasy drama film. An angel shows a businessman how life would look without him.

programme.title: Royal Carols: Together at Christmas
programme.desc: HRH The Princess of Wales hosts a special Christmas carol service at Westminster Abbey with festive musical performances, touching readings, and inspiringly warm films.

programme.title: Good Morning Britain
programme.desc: Happy Christmas! Kate is reunited with her Celebrity Traitors co-stars Sir Stephen Fry, Mark Bonnar and Jonathan Ross as we set the trio a festive mission in our Christmas quiz.

programme.title: Lorraine
programme.desc: Lorraine wishes you all a very Merry Christmas with a flock of stars including Sophie Ellis Bextor, Hugh Jackman, Kate Hudson and the stars of some of this years festive telly!

programme.title: This Morning
programme.desc: On this Christmas Day episode, all four of our hosts are joined by some fabulous guests and we help out with your last minute festive panics!

programme.title: Loose Women
programme.desc: Martin, Shirley and Harleymoon Kemp join the ladies to celebrate this Christmas Day!

programme.title: James Martins Christmas Day
programme.desc: Its Christmas Day 2025 down in Hampshire, and James is spending the big day with guests including former supermodel Jodie Kidd and presenter and Loose Women star Gloria Hunniford.

programme.title: HM The King
programme.desc: His Majesty King Charles III delivers his annual Christmas message to the nation.

programme.title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
programme.desc: Classic multi-Oscar-winning action-adventure film. An archaeologist seeks a Biblical ark.

programme.title: ITV Evening News
programme.desc: National and international news with reports and analysis from ITVs Correspondents.

programme.title: Itll Be Alright on the Night
programme.desc: Tom Allen celebrates funny cock-ups from the world of entertainment featuring Idris Elba, Paul Rudd, Ant and Dec, Susanna Reid, Alan Carr and many more of our favourite stars.

programme.title: Emmerdale
programme.desc: It is Christmas morning - as the villagers gather for mulled wine, Kim prepares to be alone while Charity is worried that Vanessa might blab on Christmas Day.

programme.title: Coronation Street
programme.desc: Secret Santa Maggie ensures that the Driscolls do not have themselves a merry little Christmas, Lisa receives a troubling update from Roy, and Carl tempts James to a festive fling.

programme.title: Bullseye Christmas Special
programme.desc: Freddie Flintoff hosts a festive special of the classic darts-based game show and is joined by former world champion Mighty Michael van Gerwen for a charity challenge.

programme.title: The 1% Club Christmas Special
programme.desc: Lee Mack hosts a festive special where every question is seasonally themed and 100 contestants hope to make the holiday season even more special by winning up to 100,000 pounds.

programme.title: Romesh Ranganathans Parents Evening: Christmas Special
programme.desc: Romesh Ranganathan hosts a festive special as famous faces Josh Widdicombe, Motsi Mabusi, and Larry and George Lamb compete for charity.

programme.title: Red One
programme.desc: Festive action-adventure comedy film. The North Poles head of security must save Santa.
